channel.title: Release Notes - 2021 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2021 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 21.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 21.12. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 21.12 is ready for use with Aspose c++ products ver 21.12. The single libAspose.Page.Cpp_x86_64_libstdcpp_libc2.23.so library is now provided instead of compiler-specific versions on the Linux OS. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 21.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 21.11. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 21.11 is based on the latest Aspose.Page for .NET 21.11. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 21.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 21.10. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 21.10 is based on the latest Aspose.Page for .NET 21.10. Key Summary Category PAGECPP-43 TextureBrush was been creating in clamp wrapmode Bug You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 21.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 21.8. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 21.8 is based on the latest Aspose.Page for .NET 21.8 excluding convert eps to emf/wmf implementation. Dynamic casts to PSDictionary, PSPackedArray wereï¿½avoiding for best performance. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 21.7 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 21.7. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 21.7 is ready for use with products ver 21.7. Based on latest Aspose.Page for .NET 21.7 PSDictionary, PSPackedArreay rest memory leaks fixed. You can consult Aspose.Page for C++ API reference for documentation.

item.title: Aspose.Page for C++ 21.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Page for C++ 21.4. Improvements and Changes Aspose.Page for C++ 21.4 is ready for use with products ver 21.4.
